Version 2.x - API

Actions

NOTICE In migrating to this new documentation, many (if not all) of the links are broken. Please use the sidebar on the left for navigation.

Action

Documents all of the activities in Trello.

Assembly: Manatee.Trello.dll

Namespace: Manatee.Trello

Inheritance hierarchy:

  • Object
  • Action

Constructors

Action(string id, TrelloAuthorization auth)

Creates a new Action instance.

Parameter: id

The action's ID.

Parameter: auth

(Optional) Custom authorization parameters. When not provided, TrelloAuthorization.Default will be used.

Properties

static Manatee.Trello.Action+Fields DownloadedFields { get; set; }

Specifies which fields should be downloaded.

DateTime CreationDate { get; }

Gets the creation date.

Member Creator { get; }

Gets the member who performed the action.

ActionData Data { get; }

Gets any associated data.

DateTime? Date { get; }

Gets the date and time at which the action was performed.

string Id { get; }

Gets the action's ID.

ActionType? Type { get; }

Gets the type of action.

Events

Action<Action, IEnumerable<string>> Updated

Raised when any data on the Action instance is updated.

Methods

void Delete()

Permanently deletes the action from Trello.

Remarks

This instance will remain in memory and all properties will remain accessible.

string ToString()

Returns a string that represents the action. The content will vary based on the value of Type.

Returns: A string that represents the action.

ActionData

Exposes any data associated with an action.

Assembly: Manatee.Trello.dll

Namespace: Manatee.Trello

Inheritance hierarchy:

  • Object
  • ActionData

string Text { get; set; }

Gets assocated text.

Associated Action Types

  • CommentCard

string Value { get; }

Gets a custom value associate with the action if any.

bool? WasArchived { get; }

Gets whether the object was previously archived.

Associated Action Types

  • UpdateCardClosed
  • UpdateListClosed

ActionType

Enumerates known types of Actions.

Assembly: Manatee.Trello.dll

Namespace: Manatee.Trello

Inheritance hierarchy:

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • ActionType

Fields

static ActionType AddAdminToBoard

Indicates a Member was added to a Board.

Indicates a Member was added to a Organization.

Indicates an Attachment was added to a Card.

Indicates a Member pinned a Board.

Indicates a CheckList was added to a Card.

Indicates a Label was added to a Card.

Indicates a Member was added to a Board.

Indicates a Member was added to an Organization.

Indicates a Organization was added to a Board.

Indicates a comment was added to a Card.

Indicates a CheckList item was converted to Card.

Indicates a Board was copied.

Indicates a Card was copied.

Indicates a CheckList was copied.

Indicates an invitation to a Board was rescinded.

Indicates a Card was deleted.

Indicates a CheckItem was deleted.

Indicates a Member was made an observer of a Board.

Indicates a Member joined Trello.

Indicates a Card was moved from one Board to another.

static ActionType MoveListFromBoard

Indicates a List was moved from one Board to another.

Indicates a List was moved from one Board to another.

static ActionType RemoveAdminFromBoard

Indicates a Member was removed as an admin from a Board.

static ActionType RemoveAdminFromOrganization

Indicates a Member was removed as an admin from an Organization.

static ActionType RemoveBoardsPinnedFromMember

Indicates an Member unpinnned a Board.

static ActionType RemoveChecklistFromCard

Indicates a CheckList was removed from a Card.

static ActionType RemoveFromOrganizationBoard

Indicates an Organization was removed from a Board.

static ActionType RemoveLabelFromCard

Indicates a Label was removed from a Card.

static ActionType RemoveMemberFromBoard

Indicates a Member was removed from a Board.

static ActionType RemoveMemberFromCard

Indicates a Member was removed from a Card.

static ActionType RemoveMemberFromOrganization

Indicates a Member was removed from an Organization.

static ActionType UnconfirmedBoardInvitation

Indicates an invitation to a Board was created.

static ActionType UnconfirmedOrganizationInvitation

Indicates an invitation to an Organization was created.

static ActionType Unknown

Not recognized. May have been created since the current version of this API.

Remarks

This value is not supported by Trello's API.

static ActionType UpdateBoard

Indicates a Board was updated.

static ActionType UpdateCard

Indicates a Card was updated.

static ActionType UpdateCheckItem

Indicates a CheckItem was updated.

Indicates a CheckList was updated.

static ActionType UpdateOrganization

Indicates an Organization was updated.

static ActionType VoteOnCard

Indicates a Member voted for a Card.

Parameter: rhs

Parameter: lhs

Parameter: rhs

Parameter: rhs

Inequality operator.

Parameter: lhs

Parameter: rhs

Returns:

int CompareTo(ActionType other)

Compares based on highest bit set. Instance with higher bit set is bigger.

Parameter: other

Returns:

bool Equals(Object obj)

Overridden. Compares equality with another object.

Parameter: obj

Returns:

Strongly-typed equality method.

Parameter: other

Returns:

Overridden. Compares equality with another object.

Parameter: obj

Returns:

Overridden. Compares equality with another object.

Parameter: obj

Returns:

Overridden. Gets the hash code of the internal BitArray.

Returns:

TypeCode GetTypeCode()

Returns TypeCode.Object.

Returns:

bool HasFlag(ActionType flags)

Checks flags to see if all the bits set in that flags are also set in this flags.

Parameter: flags

Returns:

Overridden. Returns a comma-separated string.

Returns:

CommentCollection

A collection of Actions of types ActionType.CommentCard and ActionType.CopyCommentCard.

Assembly: Manatee.Trello.dll

Namespace: Manatee.Trello

Inheritance hierarchy:

  • Object
  • ReadOnlyCollection<Action>
  • ReadOnlyActionCollection
  • CommentCollection

Methods

Action Add(string text)

Posts a new comment to a card.

Parameter: text

The content of the comment.

Returns: The Action associated with the comment.
